data.text:
🎙️ Ever thought about podcasting to boost your law firm's reach? Whether you’ve already given it some thought or not, you’ll want to check out this episode of the Profit with Law Podcast with Jason Cercone, founder and CEO of Bombtrack Media. In this episode, Moshe and Jason dive deep into the world of podcasting and its transformative potential for law firm owners. They also cover all the do’s and don’ts of podcasting. 💡 Here are 3 key takeaways from the episode: - Strategic Content Creation: Jason emphasizes the importance of creating podcast content based on the frequent questions and conversations within your field. This not only caters to your audience's interests but also solidifies your authority in the industry. - Efficiency through Batch Recording: Embrace a season-based approach by batch recording episodes. Jason suggests planning 6-10 episodes per season and scheduling recordings in 1-2 day sessions to stay ahead of the schedule. This method enhances productivity and allows for breaks, avoiding burnout. - Repurposing Content: Don’t just stop at audio; turn your podcast content into blog posts, video clips, reels, and more. This maximizes your content’s reach and impact across multiple platforms, further establishing a strong online presence. If you're a law firm owner looking to leverage podcasting for your business, this episode is packed with valuable insights for you! 🎧 Listen to the full conversation now and get inspired to elevate your marketing strategy. 🚀 🔗 https://lnkd.in/ebhwr8bU #podcasting #lawfirmmarketing #contentcreation #podcaststrategies #profitwithlawpodcast #profitwithlaw #lawfirm #lawyer #business #lawfirmgrowth #lawfirmowner #profit

🎙️ Just released: Episode 439 of the Profit with Law Podcast featuring keynote speaker, facilitator, and author Eduardo Briceno! 🌟 In this episode, we dive deep into the transformative power of having a growth mindset and how it can propel your law firm to new heights. Here are 3 key takeaways from our conversation: - 🧠 Embrace a Growth Mindset: Understand the difference between a fixed mindset and a growth mindset. Believing in your ability to learn and develop can turn potential failures into stepping stones for success. - 🎢 Take Calculated Risks with Safety Nets: Just like Cirque du Soleil performers, you need safety nets when taking risks. Whether it’s strategic marketing spending or hiring new staff, start small, seek advice, and create contingency plans. - 🌱 Continuous Personal and Professional Development: Make time for growth and learning. Developing a routine that fosters a proactive growth mindset can significantly impact your performance and the growth of your organization. Checkout the full episode here: https://lnkd.in/eMK-eazB #fixedmindset #growthmindset #mindset #leadership #profitwithlawpodcast #profitwithlaw #lawfirm #lawyer #business #lawfirmgrowth #lawfirmowner #profit

🎙️ Just dropped a new episode of the Profit with Law Podcast featuring marketing expert Jan Roos! 🚀 In this episode, Moshe Amsel and Jan Roos dive deep into the nuances of marketing to your ideal clients who don’t even know they need an attorney yet. Here's a quick recap: Jan shares actionable insights on: - Identifying the right marketing hook for difficult-to-reach target audiences. - The significance of educational content in building trust and capturing attention. - Effective strategies for niche legal areas and the importance of testing your marketing without breaking the bank. 🔑 **Key Takeaways:** - Perceived Benefits Matter: Tailoring your message to highlight what potential clients stand to gain can significantly increase click-through rates. - Education is Crucial: Offering educational content not only builds trust but also meets potential clients where they are, providing them with valuable information before they seek out legal services. - Test and Adapt: Don’t be afraid to test different headlines and approaches. Starting with a smaller budget can help you fine-tune your strategy without a huge upfront cost. 💡 Ready to elevate your law firm's marketing strategy? Tune in to hear more from Jan Roos and Moshe Amsel! 👉 Listen now: https://lnkd.in/eaf-amqv #LegalMarketing #MarketingStrategy #profitwithlawpodcast #profitwithlaw #lawfirm #lawyer #business #lawfirmgrowth #lawfirmowner #profit

🚀 **New Episode Alert!** 🚀 We just dropped Episode 437 of the Profit with Law Podcast, featuring the incredible Courtenay Shipley, a retirement plan expert with extensive experience in setting up comprehensive retirement plans. 🎙️ Moshe Amsel, dives deep into the world of wealth creation and its ripple effects across generations. Courtenay Shipley shares her journey, insights, and expert advice on navigating the complex terrain of retirement planning for business owners and their employees. Here are 3 key takeaways you won’t want to miss: 🔹 Maximize 401K Contributions: Courtenay explains the contribution limits and strategies for both highly compensated individuals and non-highly compensated employees, ensuring compliance and optimal savings. 🔹 Profit Sharing & Tax Advantages: Discover how structuring profit sharing in a 401K plan can provide significant advantages, from incentivizing employees to reducing business income taxes through a cash balance pension plan. 🔹 Employee Retention through Compensation Plans: Learn about vesting schedules, non-qualified deferred compensation plans, and the ‘golden handcuffs’ concept that strategically reward and retain top talent. 🎧 Listen to the episode now and transform the way you look at retirement plans and wealth creation! https://lnkd.in/e-UkK3Zm #ProfitSharing #401k #Planology #Retirement #QBI #WealthCreation #profitwithlawpodcast #profitwithlaw #lawfirm #lawyer #business #lawfirmgrowth #lawfirmowner #profit
